text: Herman Stok (11 July 1927 â€“ 2 June 2021) was a Dutch radio and television presenter.Presentator Herman Stok (93) van Top of Flop overleden He worked at the VARA and Hilversum 3.Top of Flop-presentator Herman Stok op 93-jarige leeftijd overleden He was most known for hosting the radio program Tijd voor Teenagers and television program Top of Flop.Presentator Herman Stok (Top of Flop) op 93-jarige leeftijd overleden Stok was born in Rotterdam and died in the same city, aged 93. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Dutch radio personalities Category:Dutch television presenters Category:People from Rotterdam
title: Herman Stok
